page.title: 01BLOCK 04040201:AMPNEY CRUCIS
page.content: The block which is part of 4 parishes {(Ampney Crucis,Ampney St Mary, Preston &{Harnhill)}falls into two sections: { {farmland}&{village.}The farmland is comprised of parts of 6 large farms and 8 smaller parcels of land. The A 417 and A 433 cross the block. The course of the Ampney Brook is a{Site {of Special Scientific Interest}with almost no public access. The two churches are ancient, both having traces of wall paintings. The land is between 325 & 425 feet above sea level. We used the residents of{Ampney {Crucis}and{Hilcot End}for our surveys.Of 242 people, 89 work full- time, 27 part-time, 22 are housewives and 104 are retired.There are 10 pre- school children, 31 school children and 17 students. There is a swing from a retirement village to a dormitory village. There are 2 successful pubs.
